participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Creative and laid-back, enjoys arts and outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: I like to make my own art, so I would like to decorate my baby's nursery with handmade wall art. Going to the beach is my favorite past time. I like taking my dog to the dog park to meet other dogs and play. I m a really, really good guitar player. Pizza is my most favorite thing.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Curious and sporty, loves reading and staying active.
participant_2.background: I am ten years old and my family is like a library. I live in a nice attic apartment in Portland, OR. I go running a lot. I play for the Baltimore Orioles. My favorite french fries are from McDonald's.

content.text: Hey! Nothing much, just hanging out in my attic apartment.
It s sunny and beautiful outside!
Sounds nice. I love the beach.
I m not too big on the beach, I live in Oregon, so I go running a lot.
That s cool. I don't really exercise much, but I do love to play guitar.
Ooh, my family is like a library, so I know a lot about music.
That s cool, I love to learn more about music.
I play for the Baltimore Orioles, do you like baseball?
I love baseball! I'm a huge fan of the New York Mets.
Oh, nice! I guess we're rivals then.
Haha, yeah, but I'm sure we can still be friends.
Of course! I'm always up for meeting new people.
Me too! It was nice talking to you, I hope we can hang out again sometime.
